meanings.definition: The act of parking a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: I found a good paiking spot near the store.
meanings.sent2: The paiking lot was full, so I had to park on the street.
meanings.sent3: The paiking meter ate all my coins!
meanings.sent4: Finding a paiking space in the city is like searching for treasure.
meanings.sent5: The paiking attendant directed me to a spot at the back of the lot.

meanings.definition: A place where vehicles can be parked.
meanings.sent1: The paiking garage charges high fees for overnight parking.
meanings.sent2: The paiking structure had a security guard on duty.
meanings.sent3: The paiking area was so crowded, I had to circle around for a spot.
meanings.sent4: The paiking facility was well-lit and clean.
meanings.sent5: I always feel relieved when I find my car safe in the paiking zone.

meanings.definition: The act of placing something in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: Her paiking of the books on the shelf was neat and organized.
meanings.sent2: The paiking of the groceries in the fridge was done quickly.
meanings.sent3: I did a terrible job at paiking the items in my suitcase.
meanings.sent4: The paiking of the decorations around the room made it festive.
meanings.sent5: His paiking of the tools in the toolbox was meticulous and efficient.
